Prevention of Terrorism (Temporary Provisions)
Act, No, 4B of 2979
[Certified on 20th July, 1879]
AN AcT To MAKE TEMPORARY PROVISION FOR THE PREVENTION (7
ACTS OF TERRORISM IW Sux LANKA, THE PREVENTION OF UXLAW-
FUL ACTIVITIES OF ANY INDIVIDUAL, GROUP OF INDIVIDUALS,
ASSOCIATION, ORGANIZATION OR BODY OF PERSONS WITEIN Sur
Lanna oR OOTSIDE SRI LANKA AND FOR MATTERS CONNECTED
THEREWITH OR INCIDENTAL THERETO.
WHEREAS the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Preamble,
Republic of Sri Lanka continues to affirm that men and
institutions remain free only when freedom is founded upon
respect for the Rule of Law and that grievances should be
redressed by constitutional methods:
AND WHEREAS public order in Sti Lanka continues to
he endangered by elements or groups of persons of associa
tlons that advocate the use of force or the commission of
crime ag a means of, or as an aid in, accomplishing govern
mental change within Sri Lanka, and who have resorted, to
acts of murder and threats of murder of members of Parlia-
ment and of local authorities, police officers, and witnesses :
to such acts and other law abiding and innocent citizens,
as well as the commission of other scts of terrorism such
as armed robbery, damage to State property and other acts
involving actual or threatened coercion, intimidation and
violence :
AND WHEREAS other democratic countries have enacted
special legislation to deal with acts of terrorism:
BE {t enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Soctalist
Republic of Sri Lanka as follows :
1. This Act may be cited as the Prevention of Terrorism ghork tite
(Temporary Provisions) Aet, No. 48 of 1979, and shell and_ date of
come into operation in respect af all or any of its provisions Peston.
on such date or dates as the Minister may appoint by Order
Published in the Gazette.
